lead_paragraph: James Hinchcliffe was released from a hospital, nine days after a wreck during Indianapolis 500 practice left him with a life-threatening leg injury.

headline.print_headline: IndyCar Driver Is Out of Hospital
headline.main: IndyCar Driver Is Out of Hospital

snippet: James Hinchcliffe was released from a hospital, nine days after a wreck during Indianapolis 500 practice left him with a life-threatening leg injury.
abstract: James Hinchcliffe is released from hospital following wreck during practice for Indianapolis 500 auto race.
